alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 26 at 1:57AM MST until January 26 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM CST /1 PM MST/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed wintry precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of less than one inch. Ice accumulations up to five hundredths of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of Southeast New Mexico, The Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains, Van Horn area, Davis Mountain Foothills around Kent. * WHEN...From 2 AM CST /1 AM MST/ to 2 PM CST /1 PM MST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and low visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In New Mexico, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-432-4269. In Texas, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-452-9292.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County
